author: crogers
msg: corrected tag attribute name in a couple of messages to match the actual attribute name for the tag.

author: mrglavas
msg: There was a race condition which allowed the XMLStreamReader constructor to
return before the start document event is produced. I've fixed that as well
as significantly simplifying the thread handling. There was a boolean that
was used to track which thread was running. Since only one thread is running
at a time we don't need it.

author: jdillon
msg: Update usage docs to include how to enable logging and debug output

author: chirino
msg: Adding the required DISCLAIMER, NOTICE, and LICENSE files and also putting
in some doxygen support in the automake system.

author: jdillon
msg: Fixed syntax error introduced by last change
